EurekaFest at MIT

In November 2022, eight other friends and I were thrilled to learn that we were selected as winners of a 2021-2022 Lemelson-MIT Inventeams $10,000 grant for our novel invention, BuzzBand. BuzzBand is a vibrating armband aimed to aid youth across the autism spectrum with focus and motivation while exercising. We...
